name: BiDiMoVe
technology: SREM and SSEM messages, IBISPlus protocol, Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), OCIT-Schnittstellen, V2X
extendableFields: Bidirektional, Multimodal, Vernetzt â€“ BiDiMoVe, focuses on improving traffic efficiency and safety in Hamburg. It uses a public transport priority system and secure communication technologies to optimize bus traffic and ensure road safety.

name: Projekt LOGIN Hannover
technology: C-ITS-based prioritization system, bidirectional data exchange
extendableFields: LOGIN project aims at future-proof prioritization of trams and buses at traffic lights in Hannover. It uses a C-ITS-based system for bidirectional data exchange between vehicles and traffic infrastructure.

name: BASt Report V 353: C2X-based Public Transport Prioritization
extendableFields: The report provides a roadmap for the gradual upgrade to C2X-based public transport prioritization at signalized junctions, focusing on planning, implementation, and operation aspects.
